games.name: Mystery Board Game
games.description:
Grammy bought this game on black friday and forgot what it
was. After opening the wrapping paper, it was discovered to be "5 Second Rule: Just Spit It Out". The Captain, Uncle Giant and J.D. all tied for first, with Grammy bringing up the rear in eighth place.

games.name: Bags
games.description: "Bags" was a bean bag toss game. Canadian Katie took a decisive lead with 5 points (in only two bags). After the first round, Uncle Giant, Lorelei, Cat and Chad were tied for second at four bags which triggered a bag-off! Uncle Giant ended the bag-off with second place.

games.description: Canadian Katie brought "Game Day Decision", she chose a game from her "90 Great Games" disc. We played a Luge game, after a lot of smack talking,
